summary: An in-depth tutorial that teaches how to create one of the most adorable interactions I've ever created.  We'll learn how to use React components and hooks to abstract behaviours, and see how to design the perfect API.  Even if you're not into animations, I think you'll find it interesting

title: New Books and ARCs, 9/6/24

summary:
There is a side-channel attack against YubiKey access tokens that allows someone to clone a device.  It’s a complicated attack, requiring the victim’s username and password, and physical access to their YubiKey—as well as some technical expertise and equipment. 
Still, nice piece of security analysis...
title: YubiKey Side-Channel Attack

summary: I watched a documentary about the Swedish author Bodil Malmsten.  The conversation turned to the mistakes you make
